title: Double-clicking on Import Statement Opens Target Type Instead of Importing Unit
description: When navigating through the package view outline, there is a problem with double-clicking on type import statements.
OB: Currently, when you double-click on a type import statement in the package view outline, it opens the editor on the target type, instead of opening the unit that hosts the import reference.
EB: The expected behavior is that double-clicking on a type import statement should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference, not the target type.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open Build 20020528.
2. Navigate to the package view outline.
3. Locate a type import statement.
4. Double-click on the type import statement.
